section: Under this Agreement, i-on will provide the following limited services for the Hosted Site: 1. connectivity to the Internet. Specific connectivity details are outlined in a separate service level agreement (SLA).
explanation: The discrepancy lies in the fact that the connectivity details are said to be outlined in a separate service level agreement (SLA). However, there is no SLA found inside of this document and should be included as part of the text.

section: 10. database server software for the Hosted Site, within the boundaries of allocated computer storage, per #5 above; 11. access to the Hosted Site via the ftp protocol to an administrative account designated by the Customer to maintain the Hosted Site's static content;
explanation: The numbered list is not set up properly and there should be a space between number 10 and 11 so that it can be read easier.

section: The Customer is responsible for paying i-on the recurring monthly fee. The Customer is responsible for paying the recurring monthly fees by the 5th day of each month.
explanation: There is a structural flaw as the same sentance is repeated twice.
